stories.text:
#!/usr/bin/env2 punkif *!type=text/plain* *!encoding=utf-8/unicode*

  io = load! {[_punkif]/lang/base}

  io.say {Hello world!} *

  user.name: {Jack R. Hacker}
  io.say {Welcome [user.name], nice to meet you.} *

  while not [user.callsign] -> ! {
      user.callsign = io.ask {What's your callsign? > }

      if not [user.callsign] -> ! {
          io.say {Please enter thy callsign, lol!}
      }
  }

  user.dir = {/home/[user.callsign]}

  ret = ! mkdir -p [user.dir]

  if [ret] not {0} -> io.say {
          mkdir -p [user.dir] FAILED!
      } *

  else -> io.say {
          SUCCESS, [user.callsign]! your home dir was created at [user.dir]
       } *

  # objects/dicts ("a" is created automagically)
  a.thing = {

  } 

  name = class ! [type] {
    first: {default first name}
    last:  {default last name}

    full = $ -> {[$.last], [$.first]}

    __init__ = $ (first, last) -> {
        $.first: [first]
        $.last: [last]
    }
  }

  person = class ! [name] {
    age: ` -1

    __init__ = $ (first, last, age) -> {
        $.super [first] [last]
        $.age: [age]
    }

    breathe = $ -> io.say {[full] breathes...} *
  }

  john = person {John} {Lennon} ` 40

  john.breathe *
Basically I want to make for python what typescript made for javascript
